bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR MEASURING QUALITY OF PERFORMANCE AND/OR COMPLIANCE WITH PROTOCOL OF A CLINICAL STUDY

abstract.p: A method is proposed for determining clinical study compliance. The method includes obtaining criteria for the clinical study and accessing stored clinical data relating to the clinical study. Thereafter, the criteria and clinical data are correlated to determine a measure of compliance with the criteria of the clinical study.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for measuring quality of performance and/or compliance with protocol of a clinical study

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR MEASURING QUALITY OF PERFORMANCE AND/OR COMPLIANCE WITH PROTOCOL OF A CLINICAL STUDY
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE MESURE DE LA QUALITE DE L'EFFICACITE ET/OU DE LA CONFORMITE A UN PROTOCOLE D'UNE ETUDE CLINIQUE

abstract.p: A method is proposed for determining clinical study compliance. The method includes obtaining criteria for the clinical study and accessing stored clinical data relating to the clinical study. Thereafter, the criteria and clinical data are correlated to determine a measure of compliance with the criteria of the clinical study.

L'invention concerne un procédé permettant de déterminer la conformité d'une étude clinique. Ledit procédé consiste à obtenir des critères destinés à ladite étude clinique et à accéder aux données cliniques stockées concernant l'étude clinique. Puis, les critères et les données cliniques sont corrélés de façon à déterminer une mesure de conformité en fonction des critères de l'étude clinique.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR MEASURING QUALITY OF PERFORMANCE AND/OR COMPLIANCE WITH PROTOCOL OF A CLINICAL STUDY
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE MESURE DE LA QUALITE DE L'EFFICACITE ET/OU DE LA CONFORMITE A UN PROTOCOLE D'UNE ETUDE CLINIQUE
